Package edu.wpi.cs3733.d20.teamk.mortuary

Interface MortuaryService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MortuaryServiceImpl
    public interface MortuaryService
    Interface for connecting to the Mortuary Service.

      • instance

      • run

        default void run()
          throws MortuaryServiceException
        Runs the API with default parameters.
        Throws:
        MortuaryServiceException

      • run

        default void run​(int xcoord,
                 int ycoord,
                 int windowWidth,
                 int windowLength,
                 java.lang.String cssPath,
                 java.lang.String destNodeID,
                 java.lang.String originNodeID)
          throws MortuaryServiceException
        Runs the API with specified parameters specified.
        Parameters:
        xcoord - X coordinate of the window.
        ycoord - Y coordinate of the window.
        windowWidth - Width of the window.
        windowLength - Length of the window, otherwise known as the height.
        cssPath - Path to style sheet to use in windows.
        destNodeID - Unused but required string parameter.
        originNodeID - ID of node from where the request was made.
        Throws:
        MortuaryServiceException

      • run

        default void run​(int xcoord,
                 int ycoord,
                 int windowWidth,
                 int windowLength,
                 java.lang.String cssPath,
                 java.lang.String nodeId,
                 EntryPoint ep)
          throws MortuaryServiceException
        Runs the API with specified parameters and entry point.
        Parameters:
        xcoord - X coordinate of the window.
        ycoord - Y coordinate of the window.
        windowWidth - Width of the window.
        windowLength - Length of the window, otherwise known * as the height.
        cssPath - Path to style sheet to use in windows.
        nodeId - ID of node from where the request was made.
        ep - Entry point for the API.
        Throws:
        MortuaryServiceException

      • run

        void run​(int xcoord,
         int ycoord,
         int windowWidth,
         int windowLength,
         java.lang.String cssPath,
         java.lang.String nodeId,
         EntryPoint ep,
         PermissionLevel permissionLevel,
         java.lang.String targetId)
  throws MortuaryServiceException
        Runs the API with specified parameters, entry point, and permission level.
        Parameters:
        xcoord - X coordinate of the window.
        ycoord - Y coordinate of the window.
        windowWidth - Width of the window.
        windowLength - Length of the window, otherwise known as the height.
        cssPath - Path to style sheet to use in windows.
        nodeId - ID of node from where the request was made.
        ep - Entry point for the API.
        permissionLevel - Permissions for logged in user.
        targetId - ID of a target request to open.
        Throws:
        MortuaryServiceException

        Updates a request already in the database.

        Parameters:
        request - Mortuary request object with a UUID already present in the database.
        Throws:
        MortuaryServiceException
